text: Jaime Rios, (August 14, 1953 – March 20, 2019)https://boxrec.com/en/proboxer/51298 was a Panamanian former professional boxer from 1973–1992. His professional record is 22–5–1 and he held the inaugural title of WBA Light Flyweight champion between 1975–1976. ==Professional boxing record== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;
